description.head: Hi I'm Jesús,
description.body:
I like Pokemon, specifically: Bulbasaur.
I started to code since 2017 when I was an intern in Pirelli México; at the beggining of 2018 I went to Milan, Italy for a code training and I was selected to startup México Digital innovation department (a.k.a Smart Manufacturing or SMO).
I'm developer leader of SMO since 2020.
